name: cboroson-KeyVault-Replication
friendlyName: Replicate secrets between Azure Key Vaults
description: Replicate secrets between Azure Key Vaults
author: Craig Boroson

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: SourceKeyVaultName
inputs.label: Source Key Vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure Key Vault.

inputs.name: TargetKeyVaultName
inputs.label: Target Key Vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure Key Vault.

inputs.name: secretOption
inputs.label: Secret retrieval option
inputs.helpMarkDown: Note that two-way replication disables automatic deletion of missing secrets.  Administrators will need to manually delete secrets from source and target Key Vaults to ensure consistency.

inputs.name: ReplicateDeletion
inputs.label: Replicate Deletion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Selecting this option will delete any secrets from the target Key Vault that are not present in the source Key Vault.  This option is only valid for one-way replication.

inputs.name: DryRun
inputs.label: Dry Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Selecting this option will only display proposed changes.  No changes will be made to the Key Vault secrets.
